concept.title: Operators
concept.shortdesc: Operators perform a specific operation on the input values or expressions.

conbody.p: N1QL provides a full set of operators that you can use within its statements. Here are the categories of N1QL operators:

ul.li: to perform basic mathematical operations (such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and divisions) on numbers.
to evaluate expressions on collections or objects.
to evaluate conditional logic in an expression
to combine operators using Boolean logic.
to access nested elements and embedded arrays.
